channel.title: ImpericaPVP - Professional | Spawn | Competitive PK Server | MUST SEE | Log-in &
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/logo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/links.png[/img]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/chat.png[/img] [url=http://www.impericapvp.com/forums]Forums[/url]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/home.png[/img] [url=http://www.impericapvp.com]Homepage[/url]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/play.png[/img] [url=http://impericapvp.com/forums/index.php?topic=33.msg58#msg58]Play Now[/url]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/about.png[/img]
ImpericaPVP has been re-established with an intention towards promoting the best PK’ing server available to the RSPS community. Tireless efforts ensure a top quality PK’ing experience as well as a dedicated development team liaising you – the player: player demands, polls and suggestions allowing a swift, up to date experience with which we as a server can compete with any competition; alongside attracting more players with a favoured alternative to the norm. We pride ourselves on our exuberant community, friendly staff and professional mentality. We’re one of the only RSPS to offer the complete package nowadays, a friendly community, an active staff team and an experience with which no one can compete. We are the best RSPS server you can play today. So, welcome to ImpericaPVP.
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/content.png[/img]
24/7 Uptime DDoS Protected Server Restricted Spawning New Shop Interface Custom PK Interface Fantastic Switching Rewritten Combat Formulas KillStreak System In-Game Highscores Items Kept on death Special Items cannot be drop/sold/traded Model Renderer Multiple PK Zones Added Custom Spawning Items Buttons Added Starter Kit Bank Completed Random PVP Drops Better Clan Chat New Text engine Loyalty-tiles on Chatbox Achievements system with rewards Correct Special Attacks/Animations

ImpericaPVP has been re-established with an intention towards promoting the best PK’ing server available to the RSPS community.
Tireless efforts ensure a top quality PK’ing experience as well as a dedicated development team liaising you – the player: player demands,
polls and suggestions allowing a swift, up to date experience with which we as a server can compete with any competition;
alongside attracting more players with a favoured alternative to the norm. We pride ourselves on our exuberant community,
friendly staff and professional mentality.
We’re one of the only RSPS to offer the complete package nowadays, a friendly community,
an active staff team and an experience with which no one can compete. We are the best RSPS server you can play today. So, welcome to ImpericaPVP.
